org.apache.flink.api.java.record.io

Class FileInputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.FileInputFormat<Record>
      • org.apache.flink.api.java.record.io.FileInputFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, InputFormat<Record,FileInputSplit>, InputSplitSource<FileInputSplit>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FixedLengthInputFormat

    public abstract class FileInputFormat
extends FileInputFormat<Record>
    The base interface for input formats that read Records from a file.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
